mapper.insert: INSERT INTO performance_flow (id, username, btime, etime, type, state) VALUES (replace(uuid(),'-',''), #{username}, #{btime}, null, 0, 1)
insert into performance (id, username, total_time, month, day, year) values (replace(uuid(),'-',''), #{username}, #{total_time}, #{month}, #{day}, #{year})
mapper.update: update performance_flow set etime=#{etime},state=0,type=1,daily_time=#{daily_time} where username=#{username} and state=1
mapper.select: select * from performance_flow where username=#{username} and state=1
